Posts.Content: Jul 1, 2013 07:42PM chattipatti wrote: Hello, Just had my surgery on June 20th, I had a good team working on me so I ws really put at ease.  I went in about 8:00 am was out by 4:30 pm.  I haven't been able to sleep in my bed too high, I've been sleeping on couch, you will need help for a minute,but now I can pretty much do everything without assistance.  My last drain tube will be removed tomorrow,yea then I can shower and drive.  Don't be scared just trust in the lord and your team.
